casebody.data:
Esteben HERNAIZ
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 15, 2019 Vishal K. Garg, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Esteben Hernaiz' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court's decision on the petitioner's motion (AC 183721) is dismissed.
